page.title: 19ANIMALS (DOMESTIC)
page.content: {Domestic:}Many households keep an animal as a pet or companion. The most popular is a dog-from a small terrier to a large Great Dane. A lot of people also keep a cat. Other pets include rabbits,hamsters,gerbils,tropical fish budgies. Some families keep a hores or a pony for riding and some breed horses for sale. {Farm:}The most numerous are beef cattle-some breeding stock but mainly fattening cattle bought at local markets as calves and"finished" on a high plain of nutriction at 15-18mths Some breed sheep mainly Cheviot Cross but most keep "stores" or "fatteners". Pigs are intensively reared (Landrace or Large White) to fatten from birth in approx 6mths. A few farms keep "free range" hens for eggs also some ducks for their eggs.
